mapper.select: SELECT topic_id, topic_name, content, tbl_topic.create_time, pm_id, pm_name, avatar FROM tbl_topic LEFT JOIN tbl_pm USING(pm_id) WHERE topic_name LIKE #{topicName}
SELECT IFNULL(collects,0) AS collectNum FROM tbl_topic LEFT JOIN (SELECT topic_id, COUNT(*) AS collects FROM tbl_collects GROUP BY topic_id) tb_collect USING(topic_id) WHERE topic_id = #{topicId};
SELECT IFNULL(likes,0) AS likeNum FROM tbl_topic LEFT JOIN (SELECT topic_id, COUNT(*) AS likes FROM tbl_likes GROUP BY topic_id) tb_like USING(topic_id) WHERE topic_id = #{topicId};

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(comment + IFNULL(reply, 0)),0) AS commentNum FROM (SELECT topic.topic_id, comment , reply FROM (tbl_topic topic LEFT JOIN (SELECT topic_id, COUNT(*) AS comment FROM tbl_comment GROUP BY topic_id) com USING(topic_id)) LEFT JOIN (SELECT topic_id, COUNT(*) AS reply -- 话题二级评论的数量 FROM tbl_comment com JOIN tbl_reply rep on com.id = rep.comment_id GROUP BY topic_id) rep ON rep.topic_id = com.topic_id) total WHERE topic_id = #{topicId} GROUP BY topic_id;
